articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Australian prime minister announces bravery award for heroes of Bondi antisemitic attack - Politico
articles.description: “This Christmas is a different one because of the anti-terror and the terrorist attack motivated by ISIS and antisemitism,” Anthony Albanese said.
articles.content: Speaking at a press conference after a Christmas Day lunch at a charitable foundation in Sydney, Albanese described a Christmas defined by a sharp contrast between extremist violence and the best of … [+1910 chars]
